ingredients.ingredient: 1 (6 ounce) whole milkfish (bangus), or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Marinate the fish in the vinegar and garlic mixture for several hours to develop flavor
Reserve some marinade to serve as a sauce alongside the cooked fish
Fry until skin is crispy and golden brown, about 5-7 minutes per side
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What's the significance of pickling the fish before frying in Filipino cuisine, and how will you know when the fish is cooked through?
